Key Match Events: Jofra Archer lbw b Bumrah 21 (15b 1x4 2x6 17m) SR: 140
Post-Match Reflections: Axar Patel was named Player of the Match with 3 wickets for 23 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Providence Stadium, Guyana
Others: The match was the 2nd semi-final of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
